properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 17 at 6:34PM HST until January 18 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF KAUAI NIIHAU OAHU
MOLOKAI AND MAUI...

.A combination of strong northeast winds and a long upstream fetch
of north winds has cause surf to become elevated along most north
facing shores of the smaller islands. This large surf is forecast
to persist through early Saturday morning, but is expected to
gradually decline during the day on Saturday.

* WHAT...Large breaking waves of 10 to 15 ft.

* WHERE...Along north facing shores of Kauai and Niihau.

* WHEN...Through early Saturday morning.

* IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break,
and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult
and dangerous.
properties.instruction:
Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by
ocean safety officials and exercise caution.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY
